- Some of your teeth feel loose
THESE SYMPTOMS CAME INTO FRICTION over the past month, gradually worsening. You’ve noticed that your gums are increasingly inflamed and tender, especially when eating or brushing, and the bleeding has become more frequent. You’ve also observed that a couple of your teeth seem to be shifting or feeling loose lately. You admit you haven’t been consistent with your dental hygiene and you’re a smoker, which runs in your family. You’re worried because you’ve never experienced anything like this before and don’t want it to get worse.
